channel.title: Random model
channel.description:
Made a weapon...supposed to be a razor sword, was a quick 30 minute model using only primitives.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/geJ7d.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6Ro74.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zr5hV.png[/img]

Newer modeller like himself

Read full topic

item.title: Random model
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

You want constructive? Fine.

You’re blade is extremely short, unless it is a dagger. Though daggers are known to be thinner, so you should try thinning your blade if that is the case. Your arm… hole? Is too small for a hand to fit into, which means you should widen it or make it like a brace and just add the blade off that. You created faces to connect to the main box from the arm hole which made the wireframe messy, try avoiding that. The handle part in the blade is a poly over kill, try using less poly on it as it is not needed.

Other concepts are better to work off when you first start as it is like a guideline, unless you’ve drawn/made pictures of your own ideas that you can go off. Your concept could have been represented better had you had more experience, work on some other projects and then return to this later. I tend to find it helps a lot when you know more and come back to older models but that might just be me. Good luck with future models, i hope you learn from comments made as they’re from experienced members.

Read full topic

item.title: Random model
item.dc:creator: @MareInTheMoon MareInTheMoon
item.description:
@MareInTheMoon wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:4, topic:439309”]I think you should Google other people’s concepts, this is just a horrible concept. Your wire frame is horrible as well, you’ve unneccesary poly under the model as well.[/quote]What a nice thing to say. Try constructive criticism next time.

Read full topic

item.title: Random model
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

Yes, i was being a stupid… is the word dick? about it. I was stating what was wrong and i did not provide him with the correct way to do it because i do not know what he did to the primitive, i’ve no idea if he used the knife tool or if he just use the pull tool or extrude tool. Newer modeller like himself make it hard to understand their creation process and if i jumped to conclusions, i would have been told off nonetheless.

Read full topic

item.title: Random model
item.dc:creator: @Butchd12 Butchd12
item.description:
@Butchd12 wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:5, topic:439309”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=542002.msg3971373#msg3971373 date=1334184336]
I think you should Google other people’s concepts, this is just a horrible concept. Your wire frame is horrible as well, you’ve unneccesary poly under the model as well.
[/quote]
Tell him how he could improve the Wireframe instead?

Wonderful job. just keep improving. When I get home I’ll give better examples on what to improve.[/quote]

I completely agree with you, People like Amy need to give constructive feed back instead of being a stupid D*** about it. But on a positive note, I think it looks neat, with a little more work I think this could turn out to be amazing. I would actually like to see this in a private server, and Im not a fan of custom weapons in a server.

And now, time for some good ol’ suggestions.

I would suggest making the hole where you would put your arm more of a circle, and make the blade a little longer to have it look a little better. And as for the poly count, Im sure you could find a way to reduce the poly count without sacerficing any of the look or feel of the weapon.

Read full topic
